pr_title: HDDS-3455. Change MiniLoadGenerator to a pluggable model.

timeline.bodyText: If some generator fails to initialize(), should we still consider it in load(long)?  I think it would be more safe to add each generator to a separate list, from which load(long) should choose, only after successful initialization.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: done, if the initialization fails. ane exception is thrown to stop the chaos cluster.
replies.author: mukul1987
